name: Maya Island
description:
This game is a sort of inspiration from the game Islanders. It was made by seven students of Paris Ynov Campus for a 48h Challenge. The principe of the game is simple, you are building from the bottom a new aztec civilisation, starting by a simple jungle to a giant island. You will get to think about the way you should interact with the environement and how the island could look better. 

Enjoy :D
